Package shared

Interface SelectableHotel

All Known Implementing Classes:
ChangeRoomTypeModel, CreateReservationModel, CreateRoomModel, DPMModel, EnterHotelNameModel, RemoveHotelModel, RemoveReservationModel, RemoveRoomModel, UpdateBasePriceModel, ViewHotelModel
public interface SelectableHotel
The interface for MVCs that require a selected hotel to work.
Author:
Angela Domingo
